message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.DB 

Reasoning: The paper presents an approach to information filtering by analyzing the content of text documents using a profile-based approach. This involves creating a user profile from their document collection and using problem-oriented Wikipedia subcorpora to filter information flow. This approach involves techniques from information retrieval (IR), natural language processing (NLP), deep learning (DL), machine learning (ML), and database (DB) systems. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IR, followed by cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.LG, and cs.DB.
